original_definition: '4-star compartment' means a frozen compartment with a target temperature and storage conditions of - 18 °C and which fulfils the requirements for the freezing capacity;
generated_definition: '4-star compartment' means a compartment type with a target temperature equal to or below 0 °c, as set out in annex iii, table 3.

Article 2: ‘freezer compartment’ or ‘4-star compartment’ means a frozen compartment with a target temperature and storage conditions of - 18 °C and which fulfils the requirements for the freezing capacity;
‘freezer’ means a refrigerating appliance with only 4-star compartments;
‘frozen compartment’ means a compartment type with a target temperature equal to or below 0 °C; that is a 0-star, 1-star, 2-star, 3-star or 4-star compartment, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
‘frozen compartment’ means acompartment typewith atarget temperatureequal to or below 0 °C; that is a 0-star, 1-star, 2-star, 3-star or4-star compartment, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
Article 10: between 1,15  and 1,56  for combi appliances with 3- or 4-star compartments (2), 1,15  for other combi appliances, 1,00  for other refrigerating appliances
for appliances without a 4-star compartment: ‘this refrigerating appliance is not suitable for freezing foodstuffs’;
